welcome_message2: Discover fascinating places with our audio guides
welcome_message3: Explore tourist destinations in a unique and immersive way. Create and share your own guides.
about_message: This is a company dedicated to the development of web applications
about_message2: Audioguias is a web application that allows users to create and share audio guides for tourist locations.
about_message3: This application has been developed by:
name: Name
search_for: Search audio guide by title, city or country...
title: Title
confirm_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Enter your password to confirm:
confirm_delete_audioguide: Are you sure you want to delete this audio guide?
verification_message: In order to access all the functionalities of the application, it is necessary to verify the account. Send an email verification:
banned_message: Your account has been banned by an administrator. To find out the reasons, please contact us.
invalid_name: The name must not contain numbers or special characters.
download_message2: Download our Android application to be able to enjoy all the content from your phone.
reset_password_message: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
invalid_surname: The surname must not contain numbers or special characters.
password_to_weak: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
email_already_exists: The email is already in use
invalid_title: The title must not contain numbers or special characters.
invalid_country: The country must not contain numbers or special characters.
invalid_city: The city must not contain numbers or special characters.
generic_error: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
